title: Loi pour une République numérique ("Digital Republic Law")
notes: Includes requirements on algorithmic transparency (e.g. explainability in public algorithms).

title: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
notes: EU data protection law with implications for AI (data fairness, automated decision-making rules).

title: Executive Order 13859 ("American AI Initiative")
notes: Trump EO directing federal AI strategy and coordination across agencies.

title: OECD AI Principles
notes: Council Recommendation on AI (47 countries) encouraging trustworthy AI.

title: National Artificial Intelligence Initiative Act
notes: Law establishing a coordinated federal AI R&D and governance program.

title: EU Artificial Intelligence Act (proposal)
notes: European Commission unveils first comprehensive AI regulation.

title: Recommendation on Ethics of Artificial Intelligence
notes: First global AI ethics standard (193 Member States).

title: NYC Local Law 144 (AI Hiring Tool Audit)
notes: City law requiring bias audits of automated employment decision tools (AEDTs).

title: California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA)
notes: State privacy law (Jan 2023) includes enhanced oversight of automated decision-making.

title: Deep Synthesis (Deepfake) Management Regulations
notes: Impose self-assessment and disclosure requirements on online AI services. Bans harmful deepfake uses.

title: Executive Order 14110 ("Safe, Secure, and Trustworthy AI")
notes: Biden EO advancing coordinated US AI governance.

title: Utah Artificial Intelligence Policy Act (H.B. 149)
notes: State law requiring disclosures on generative AI (effective May 1, 2024).

title: EU AI Act passed by European Parliament
notes: Parliament approval; Council approval followed (21 May 2024); in force 1 Aug 2024.

title: Colorado Artificial Intelligence Act (SB24-205)
notes: State AI consumer protection law (effective Feb 1, 2026).

title: EU Artificial Intelligence Act (final adoption)
notes:
EU law regulating AI (all uses) by risk level; came into force 1 Aug 2024.

Key timeline:
21 Apr 2021 – European Commission formally proposed the regulation
9 Dec 2023 – European Parliament and Council reached provisional agreement
12 Jul 2024 – Act published in the Official Journal of the European Union
1 Aug 2024 – Act entered into force
2 Feb 2025 – Prohibitions on 'unacceptable risk' AI systems (e.g., social scoring, real-time biometric ID, emotion recognition in workplaces) take effect
2 Aug 2025 – Obligations for general-purpose AI (GPAI) models (transparency, risk governance) apply
2 Aug 2026 – General application date for most provisions
2 Aug 2027 – Certain obligations for high-risk AI systems embedded in regulated products/infrastructures become applicable.

title: Framework Convention on AI (CETS 225)
notes: First international AI treaty opened for signature.

title: FDA Final Guidance on AI-Enabled Medical Devices
notes: FDA guidance for "predetermined change control plans" in AI/ML medical device software.

title: Executive Order 14141 ("AI & Democratic Values")
notes: Biden EO on protecting democracy from AI risks (revoked 20 Jan 2025).

title: Act on Promotion of R&D and Use of AI
notes: Japan's first AI promotion law passed by Diet (soft-law framework).

title: Stop Deepfakes Act (S. 6954A)
notes: NY Senate bill passed requiring provenance data on AI-generated media (awaiting signature).

title: Responsible AI Governance Act (H.B. 140)
notes: Texas AI law signed (effective Jan 1, 2026), covers biometric identifiers, bans AI social scoring.

title: Fair Credit Reporting Act (FCRA)
notes: Regulates consumer reporting agencies; accuracy, access, correction rights.

title: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)
notes: Student education records privacy; access/correction rights.

title: Privacy Act of 1974
notes: Governs federal agencies’ collection/use of PII; access, amendment, and fair information practices.

title: Electronic Communications Privacy Act (ECPA)
notes: Wiretap Act + Stored Communications Act; access rules for electronic communications.

title: Video Privacy Protection Act (VPPA)
notes: Limits disclosure of video-viewing records.

title: Telephone Consumer Protection Act (TCPA)
notes: Consent/opt-out rules for calls, texts, faxes; Do-Not-Call.

title: Driver's Privacy Protection Act (DPPA)
notes: Restricts disclosure of personal data from state DMV records.

title: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
notes: Privacy/Security Rules for protected health information (PHI).

title: Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA)
notes: Parental notice/consent for collecting data from children under 13.

title: Gramm–Leach–Bliley Act (GLBA)
notes: Privacy Rule, Safeguards Rule; regulates financial institutions’ handling of nonpublic personal information.

title: CAN-SPAM Act
notes: Commercial email rules; opt-out and identification requirements.

title: California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) (AB 375)
notes: First comprehensive U.S. state privacy law; effective Jan 1, 2020.

title: California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) (Prop 24)
notes: Amends/expands CCPA; creates CPPA; effective Jan 1, 2023 (with lookback to Jan 1, 2022).

title: Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA)
notes: Comprehensive consumer data privacy law; effective Jan 1, 2023.

title: Colorado Privacy Act (SB21-190)
notes: Comprehensive privacy law; effective July 1, 2023.

title: Connecticut Data Privacy Act (CTDPA) (SB 6)
notes: Comprehensive privacy law; effective July 1, 2023.

title: Utah Consumer Privacy Act (UCPA) (SB 227)
notes: Effective Dec 31, 2023.

title: Nevada SB 220 (Online Privacy Sale Opt-Out)
notes: Opt-out of “sale” of certain personal information; effective Oct 1, 2019.

title: Biometric Information Privacy Act (BIPA)
notes: Notice/consent, retention policy; private right of action (amended in 2024).

title: My Health My Data Act (HB 1155)
notes: Covers consumer health data outside HIPAA; key provisions effective 2024 (later for small businesses).

title: Florida Digital Bill of Rights (SB 262)
notes: Consumer rights + platform duties; various effective dates from July 2023.

title: Oregon Consumer Privacy Act (OCPA)
notes: Effective July 1, 2024 (later for certain nonprofits).

title: Delaware Personal Data Privacy Act
notes: Comprehensive privacy law; staged effective dates beginning 2025.

title: Iowa Consumer Data Protection Act (SF 262)
notes: Effective Jan 1, 2025.

title: Indiana Consumer Data Protection Act (INCDPA)
notes: Effective Jan 1, 2026.

title: Tennessee Information Protection Act (TIPA)
notes: Comprehensive privacy law; effective July 1, 2025.

title: Montana Consumer Data Privacy Act
notes: Effective Oct 1, 2024 (some provisions/assessments 2025+).

title: Texas Data Privacy and Security Act (TDPSA)
notes: Effective July 1, 2024; additional opt-out agent provisions phased in 2025.

title: New Jersey Data Privacy Act (SB 332)
notes: Effective Jan 15, 2025.

title: Maryland Online Data Privacy Act (MODPA)
notes: Effective Nov 1, 2025.

title: Minnesota Consumer Data Privacy Act (MCDPA)
notes: Effective July 31, 2025 (staggered for some sectors).

title: Kentucky Consumer Data Protection Act
notes: Effective Jan 1, 2026.

title: New Hampshire Privacy Act (NHPA)
notes: Comprehensive privacy law (effective 2025).

title: Nebraska Data Privacy Act
notes: Effective Apr 17, 2024; cure period ends Dec 31, 2025.

title: Rhode Island Data Privacy & Protection Act
notes: Effective Jan 1, 2026.

title: California Age-Appropriate Design Code (AB 2273)
notes: Signed Sept 15, 2022; enforcement enjoined by federal courts pending litigation.

title: California Delete Act (SB 362) – Data Broker Registry & Deletion Mechanism
notes: Expands data-broker registry; creates one-stop deletion mechanism (DROP) with phased rollout (2026+).

title: Privacy Act 1988 (Cth)
notes: Federal law regulating the handling of personal information by Australian Government agencies and private sector organisations (APP entities). :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

title: Notifiable Data Breaches (NDB) scheme (under Privacy Act 1988)
notes: Introduced under the Privacy Act; requires entities to notify individuals & the Office of the Australian Information Commissioner (OAIC) when a data breach is likely to cause serious harm. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

title: Competition and Consumer Act 2010 – Consumer Data Right privacy safeguards
notes: Under the Competition and Consumer Act 2010, the Consumer Data Right (CDR) includes legal privacy & security safeguards for consumer data. :contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}

title: Framework for Responsible and Ethical Enablement of Artificial Intelligence (FREE-AI)
notes: RBI Committee Report setting out seven guiding ‘Sutras’ and 26 recommendations under six strategic pillars for responsible and ethical AI adoption in the financial sector.
